data.title: Oracle OpenWorld '97
data.text:
801 International Business Machines Corporation

New Orchard Road

Armonk, NY 10504

800.IBM.4YOU

http://www.ibm.com

IBM offers the widest range of software, hardware, and services in the information-technology industry-from PCs to mainframes, operating systems to application development tools√ëand integrates and transforms these technologies into business solutions. 809 Compaq Computer Corporation

20555 State Highway 249

Houston, TX 77070-2698

281.370.0670

http://www.compaq.com

Compaq Computer Corporation, a Fortune 100 company, is the fourth largest computer company in the world. As a leader in distributed enterprise solutions, Compaq is committed to delivering high-performance, high-availability, fault- tolerant, and tightly integrated end-to-end solutions. 901 Siemens Pyramid Information Systems, Inc.

3860 North First Street

San Jose, CA 95134-1702

408.428.9000

http://www.siemens-pyramid.com

Siemens Pyramid is a leading provider of scalable open enterprise systems delivering the industry's most complete range of solutions from the desktop to the data center. It provides strategic services for business-critical environments complemented by programs and support tools 911 Computer Associates International, Inc.

1 Computer Associates Plaza

Islandia, NY 11788

516.342.5224

http://www.tcai.com

Computer Associates International (NYSE: CA) is the world leader in mission- critical business software. CA develops, licenses, and supports more than 500 integrated products, including enterprise computing, information management, and financial applications. CA had revenue of $3.9 billion in 1996. 1001 Sun Microsystems Computer Corporation

901 San Antonio Road

Palo Alto, CA 94303

800.786.0785

http://www.sun.com

From the beginning, Sun envisioned a world where diverse computers and programs could work together seamlessly. Every product it produces, every service it provides reflects that vision. As a result, Sun Microsystems is a worldwide leader in network computing services. 1011 Digital Equipment Corporation

200 Forest Street

Marlboro, MA 01752

508.467.2441

http://www.digital.com

Digital Equipment Corporation is a world leader in open client/server solutions. Digital's scalable Alpha and x86 platforms, storage, networking, software, and services, together with industry-focused solutions from business partners, help organizations compete and win in today's global marketplace. 1201 Hewlett-Packard Company

P.O. Box 10301

3000 Hanover Street

Palo Alto, CA 94303-0890

800.637.7740

http://www.hp.com

Hewlett-Packard is a leading global manufacturer of computing, communications, and measurement products and services. Recognized for excellence in quality and support, HP is the second largest U.S. computer supplier and is Oracle's number-one server platform based on software license revenues.
